termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to KosMeet! These Terms of Service ('Terms') constitute a legally binding agreement between you and KosMeet ('we', 'us', 'our'). By using KosMeet, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.description: KosMeet is a dating and matching app that helps users build meaningful connections through:
items: Compatibility analysis based on traditional Ba Zi (八字) and Zi Wei Dou Shu (紫微斗數) principles
MBTI personality type matching
Real-time chat functionality
Profile browsing and match recommendations
section1.note: KosMeet only provides matching suggestions and a social platform. We do not guarantee any specific outcomes, including finding a partner or establishing relationships.

section2.title: 2. Eligibility
items: Be at least 18 years old
Have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts
Not have been previously banned from our service
Not have been convicted of sexual or violent crimes
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
section2.violation: If you do not meet the above eligibility requirements, please do not use KosMeet. We reserve the right to verify your eligibility at any time.

section3.title: 3. Account Registration and Security
items: You must provide accurate, complete, and current information
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
You are responsible for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately if you discover unauthorized use
You may not transfer or sell your account to others
Each person may only have one account

section4.title: 4. User Conduct Guidelines
section4.subtitle1: You Agree to Follow These Rules
section4.description1: When using KosMeet, you agree to:
items1: Only upload your own authentic photos
Provide truthful and accurate personal information
Interact with others in good faith and sincerity
items2: Impersonate others or create fake identities
Upload photos that are not of yourself or steal others' images
Send harassing, threatening, abusive, or discriminatory messages
Send pornographic, obscene, or inappropriate content
Engage in scams, fraud, or money solicitation
Solicit commercial activities, advertising, or pyramid schemes
Distribute malware, viruses, or harmful code
Attempt to hack, crack, or interfere with the service
Collect or scrape other users' personal information
Use automated tools, bots, or crawlers
Circumvent any security or access control measures
Engage in any illegal activities
section4.enforcement: We reserve the right to take action against users who violate these Terms, including warnings, suspension, or permanent termination.

section5.title: 5. User Content
section5.description1: You retain ownership of all content you upload to KosMeet (including photos, text, messages). However, you grant us:
items1: A non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide, sublicensable license
To use, copy, modify, and display your content to provide services
This license terminates when you delete content or your account (but may persist in backups or copies downloaded by other users)
section5.description2: You warrant that content you upload:
items2: Does not infringe any third party's intellectual property rights
Does not contain illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content
Is accurate and not misleading
Complies with all applicable laws
section5.removal: We reserve the right to remove any content we deem violates these Terms or is inappropriate, without prior notice.

section6.title: 6. Paid Services and Subscriptions
section6.description1: KosMeet offers free and paid features. Paid services include:
items2: Prices are as displayed at time of purchase
Payments are processed through Apple App Store or Google Play Store
Subscriptions auto-renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the current period ends
You can manage or cancel subscriptions in your device's account settings
section6.description3: All purchases are processed through Apple/Google and subject to their refund policies. KosMeet does not process refunds directly.
items3: To request a refund for iOS purchases: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204084
To request a refund for Android purchases: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2479637
If a purchase is refunded, access to purchased features/credits will be automatically revoked
section6.refundAbuse: Accounts with repeated refund patterns may be flagged and restricted from making future purchases.

section7.title: 7. Compatibility Analysis Disclaimer
items: Compatibility analysis based on Ba Zi and Zi Wei Dou Shu is for cultural reference and entertainment purposes only
Analysis results do not constitute professional advice (including but not limited to psychological, marriage, or relationship counseling)
We do not guarantee the accuracy of analysis or any specific outcomes
You should not rely solely on analysis results for major life decisions
Every relationship depends on many factors far beyond what any analysis system can predict
section7.acknowledgment: By using this feature, you understand and accept these limitations.

section8.title: 8. Safety and Risks
items1: We cannot guarantee other users' identities or intentions
Be cautious when sharing personal information
Choose public places for first meetings
Inform friends or family of your dating plans
Trust your instincts; leave if you feel uncomfortable
section8.description2: If you encounter any of the following, please use the in-app report feature immediately:
items2: Suspicious or fraudulent behavior
Harassment or threats
Inappropriate content
Underage users
Any behavior violating these Terms
section8.disclaimer: KosMeet is not responsible for interactions between users, including any events that occur online or offline.

section9.title: 9. Intellectual Property
items: KosMeet's name, logo, design, features, and content are our or our licensors' property
You may not copy, modify, distribute, or otherwise use our intellectual property
Your use of our service does not constitute any transfer of intellectual property rights
If you believe your intellectual property rights have been infringed, please contact us

section10.title: 10. Disclaimers
section10.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
items: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis
We make no express or implied warranties
We do not guarantee the service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure
We are not responsible for other users' actions
We are not responsible for any matching or relationship outcomes
We are not responsible for the accuracy of compatibility analysis

section11.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
section11.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
items: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, punitive, or consequential damages
Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the past 12 months
Some jurisdictions do not allow limitation of liability, so the above limitations may not apply to you

section12.title: 12. Indemnification
section12.description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless KosMeet, its affiliates, directors, and employees from any claims, losses, or expenses (including attorney fees) arising from:
items: Your violation of these Terms
Your use of the service
Content you upload
Your interactions with other users
Your violation of any laws or third-party rights

section13.title: 13. Account Termination
section13.description1: You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.
section13.description2: We may suspend or terminate your account under the following circumstances:
items2: You violate these Terms
You engage in suspicious or illegal activities
Your behavior poses risks to other users
Legal requirements
Account inactive for one year
section13.effect: After account termination, you will lose access to your account and content. Certain provisions (such as disclaimers, limitation of liability) survive termination.

section14.title: 14. Dispute Resolution
items: These Terms are governed by Taiwan law
You agree to first attempt to resolve disputes amicably via email
If amicable resolution fails, disputes shall be submitted to courts with jurisdiction in Taiwan
You agree to waive participation in class actions (to the extent permitted by law)

section15.title: 15. Modifications to Terms
section15.description: We may modify these Terms from time to time:
items: Significant changes will be notified via app or email
Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of modified Terms
If you do not agree to new Terms, please stop using the service and delete your account

section16.title: 16. General Terms
items: Entire Agreement: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the service
Severability: If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions remain effective
Waiver: Our failure to enforce any right does not constitute waiver of that right
Assignment: You may not assign rights under these Terms; we may freely assign
Force Majeure: We are not responsible for delays or failures due to events beyond our reasonable control

section17.title: 17. Contact Us
section17.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact:
section17.address: No. 104, Caoya 1st Rd, Cianjhen District, Kaohsiung City, 806, Taiwan
